jcr:root.description1: Process electronic wastes through professional recyclers
jcr:root.description2: Comply with local environment laws and regulations to process some electronic wastes that cannot.be recycled.
jcr:root.description3: Never employ child or prison labor to process electronic wastes.
jcr:root.description4: Delete private data on your devices in a professional way to protect your privacy.
jcr:root.description5: Reduce the electronic waste landfill rate to the minimum during the recycle.
jcr:root.disclaimer: To maximize resource usage, Huawei effectively processes recycled cell phones in an eco-friendly way by using the following methods:
